title: Process Amazon SQS records with AWS Lambda (Python)
description: This pattern shows how to process Amazon SQS messages using AWS Lambda.

introBox.headline: How it works
text: The AWS SAM template deploys an AWS Lambda function, an Amazon SQS queue, a dead-letter SQS queue, and the IAM permissions required to run the application. Lambda polls the SQS queue and invokes the Lambda function when new messages are available.

bullets.text: Introducing an enhanced local IDE experience for AWS Lambda developers

text: See the GitHub repo for detailed testing instructions.
